title._content: Image taken from page 281 of 'Through the Kalahari Desert. A narrative of a journey ... to Lake N'Gami and back. ... Illustrations, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Through the Kalahari Desert. A narrative of a journey ... to Lake N'Gami and back. ... Illustrations, etc" Author: FARINI, Gilarmi A. - [William Leonard Hunt.] Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10096.ff.2." Page: 281 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1886 Publisher: Sampson Low & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001199723 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
